title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, November 30, 2020
description: It's the birthday of Mark Twain (born Samuel Clemens), who said, "A successful book is not made of what is in it, but of what is left out of it."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of Mark Twain (born Samuel Clemens), who said, "A successful book is not made of what is in it, but of what is left out of it."
